document_data.name: Rueldarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Rueldarr''' was the innkeeper of the [[Flaming Griffon]] inn in [[Mordulkin]] in [[Chessenta]] in the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the winter of the [[1374 DR|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], Rueldarr rented rooms to [[Ythnel Duumin]], [[Kestus Aentius]], [[Muctos Dapritus]], and [[Kohtakah]], who'd just escaped to Mordulkin from [[Luthcheq]]. He sent and received messages for them.
document_data.Description: He wore a green [[tunic]] and brown [[linen]] vest, with a very thick mustache.
